Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 43rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: Westbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Saint Lawrence, 42nd, King Drive, and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Saint Lawrence, 42nd, King Drive, and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Shuttle buses are available between Clinton and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
